descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Squingle is a cosmic 3D puzzle game that could only exist in VR.

Your challenge is to guide 2 spinning orbs to the goal through intricate, glass-like mazes called ‘squingles.’ 

Each level offers a mesmerizing visual experience, featuring dynamic, morphing sculptures that come to life in fully immersive environments or in Mixed Reality. 

With intuitive controls and hand-tracking support, Squingle will captivate your mind and spirit.

#  ✨ 100 LEVELS
Launching with 100 levels, with more added over time. Levels grow complex, featuring tighter spaces and new challenges.

# 🌈 A VISUAL MASTERPIECE
Each maze is a stunning, morphing sculpture, offering an unmatched visual experience in Mixed Reality or fully immersive modes.

# 🧩 EASY TO PICK, HARD TO MASTER
Designed to be accessible for both newcomers to VR and experts seeking a transcendent experience, with intuitive controls and hand tracking support for seamless play, whether standing or seated.

# 😌 RELAX & UNWIND
Play on the sofa or in room-sized mazes. Squingle’s calming gameplay will soothe your soul.

# 🏅 AWARDS
- Best VR Game ~ GDWC Finalist
- Finalist ~ QLDXR Festival
- “Best of the Quest” ~ Gibby’s Guide

# FEATURES
- Challenge Mode: Time trials and global leaderboards.
- Room/Mini scale: Play big or small!
- Race your ghost: Beat your best times.


Get ready to be Squingled!
